verbose_text: In addition, an understanding of Wnt dependent butyrate mediated changes in gene expression can inform about the development of butyrate resistance in CRC, which we have shown involves repressed induction of Wnt signaling in the presence of butyrate [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Wnt-dependent butyrate-mediated changes in gene expression can inform about the development of butyrate resistance in CRC
